text: And fortune, on his damned quarrel smiling.. For brave Nomacs - well he deserves that name - Disdaining fortune, with his brandish'd steel,. Which smoked with bloody execution, Like valour's minion carved out his passage. Till he faced the slave; Suow'd lite Q rebel's whore: but oll's too weak: For brave Nouacs ~ well be dleserves thet uaue - Dsdaiuing fotuwu, witu bis braudish'd steeL1 Nike valour's wiuiou carved\ out lis passaqe Till he Joced\the slawe;
